 [ALINEA-TITLE] Cascade-level=0
 [TITLE] = Plan_Velo_FR_page5
 nativeID=0 parentID=-1 & horizontal_ordering=0
 texttype=texttype.TITLE & enumeration-type=enum_type.UNKNOWN
 Summary Flag = False

 [ALINEA-SUMMARY]:
The French government is actively promoting cycling as a transportation option by investing in cycling infrastructure, encouraging more people to cycle, and providing support for electric bike purchases. They plan to continue these efforts with a new phase of the plan and increased funding. 

 [ALINEA-CONTENT]:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 [ALINEA-TITLE] Cascade-level=1
 [TITLE] = LE VÉLO ET LA MARCHE : DES MOBILITÉS D’AVENIR
 nativeID=1 parentID=0 & horizontal_ordering=0
 texttype=texttype.HEADLINES & enumeration-type=enum_type.UNKNOWN
 Summary Flag = False

 [ALINEA-SUMMARY]:
The text highlights the efforts made by the French government to promote cycling as a means of transportation. It mentions the investment in creating cycling infrastructure, the increase in the number of cyclists, and the support provided for the purchase of electric bikes. The government plans to continue promoting cycling with a new phase of the plan and additional funding. 

 [ALINEA-CONTENT]:
Atteindre la neutralité carbone à l’horizon 2050
implique de poursuivre et d’accentuer la réduc-
tion des gaz à effet de serre sur l’ensemble du

          ***          [--- more alinea content ---]        ***          

voulons redoubler d’efforts pour continuer à
rendre le vélo accessible à chaque Français, en
ville comme dans tous les territoires.

c’est la longueur total des aménagements
cyclables qui ont été créés, dont 17 000 km

territoire (+40 % depuis 2017).

 [ALINEA-TITLE] Cascade-level=2
 [TITLE] = • 4 millions
 nativeID=4 parentID=1 & horizontal_ordering=2
 texttype=texttype.HEADLINES & enumeration-type=enum_type.UNKNOWN
 Summary Flag = False

 [ALINEA-SUMMARY]:
The text states that 200,000 bicycles have been registered in the new national registration system, which helps combat theft and return bikes to their owners when found. It also mentions that since 2019, a program called "Savoir rouler à vélo" has trained 200,000 children to be independent cyclists before entering middle school. 

 [ALINEA-CONTENT]:
c’est le nombre de vélos qui ont été inscrits
dans le nouveau registre national d’immatri-
culation, grâce au marquage obligatoire des

          ***          [--- more alinea content ---]        ***          

vélos qui permet de lutter contre le vol et de
restituer les vélos à leurs propriétaires lors-
qu’ils sont retrouvés.

les enfants entrant au collège de maîtriser la
pratique du vélo.

 [ALINEA-TITLE] Cascade-level=2
 [TITLE] = • 17 millions
 nativeID=8 parentID=1 & horizontal_ordering=5
 texttype=texttype.HEADLINES & enumeration-type=enum_type.UNKNOWN
 Summary Flag = False

 [ALINEA-SUMMARY]:
Since 2017, a total of 5.6 million bicycles have been sold in France, including 2.9 million electric bikes. The government's Plan vélo et marche has been successful in promoting cycling, and to further accelerate its impact, the Prime Minister has launched a second phase of the plan for 2023-2027, including a new fund of 250 million euros for cycling. 

 [ALINEA-CONTENT]:
c’est le nombre de vélos vendus depuis 2017,
dont 2,9 millions à assistance électrique.
Depuis le lancement du Plan vélo et marche, la

          ***          [--- more alinea content ---]        ***          

le vélo, doté de 250 millions d’euros en 2023 et
le lancement d’un comité interministériel.
